DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pathogenesis hemangioma infancy relate normal pregnancy pregnancy complicate placenta abnormality . Women gestational age enrol study . Maternal serum , placental , cord blood sample obtain subject . A medical history obtain subject . Post-delivery member study team perform cutaneous exam infant establish birthmark present birth . Mother receive four phone call follow ups determine infant skin change . If yes , mother ask bring child evaluation . If hemangioma diagnose , blood draw perform .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Study Comparing Incidence Infantile Hemangiomas Following Normal Pregnancies Versus Pregnancies Complicated Placental Abnormalities
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman deliver Sharp Mary Birch Hospital Women San Diego , CA
